'''Overseer Hitenga''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|A guard folds his arms, watching the activity on the walkways through slitted eyes. A coral piercing juts from his lower lip.}}
Overseer Hitenga is the Mataru in charge of The Gullet and the exploitation of the Roparu living within it.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [All Aboard](/allAboard/)
|none            = 
|other           =
* You can convince Overseer Hitenga to grant you access to the Old City with [History](/history/) 3, [Survival](/survival/) 5, or {{cp2|200}}.
* You can pickpocket or loot a [Marked Suole](/markedSuole/) from the overseer, a trinket he had confiscated from [Botaro](/botaro/). The suole is a token of Príncipi allegiance, and can be used to grant access to [Dereo's Lair](/dereosLair/).
}}

## =Quests

=
* [All Aboard](/allAboard/): Hitenga orders [Botaro](/botaro/)'s exile to the Old City.
[Category:The Gullet characters](/categoryTheGulletCharacters/)

{{Description|A guard folds his arms, watching the activity on the walkways through slitted eyes. A coral piercing juts from his lower lip.}}
Overseer Hitenga is the Mataru in charge of The Gullet and the exploitation of the Roparu living within it.
